intro: Suddenly turned into a ghost and in a total panic! Set off on an adventure with Ocho-kodama as your companion to meet the King of Hell, Enma!
description:
One day, after suddenly becoming a ghost, YUUREIKUN was in a panic, having lost all his memories.

Then a soul named Ochoco-dama appeared, pleading, “My friends are trapped in hell. Please help me.” This complicated the situation for YUUREIKUN, who was already overwhelmed.

But thinking that meeting Great King Enma might provide answers, YUUREIKUN headed to hell with Ochoco-dama as his companion.

This is an action game released by SYSTEM SACOM for the MSX2 in 1989.

Players defeat various enemies with standard shots (Ochoco-Dama) and a backward-leaping tackle (Back Attack). Beautiful graphics that fully utilized the MSX2's capabilities and large enemy characters made this a highly acclaimed title, earning a lot of user support.


*The main game are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
